text: Chris "Harold" Raymond is a former American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Colby College in Waterville, Maine from 1983 to 1985, compiling a record of 5–19. He is the son of long-time Delaware Blue Hens football coach Harold "Tubby" Raymond. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Colby Mules football coaches Category:Delaware Fightin' Blue Hens football coaches Category:Maine Black Bears football coaches Category:Trinity Bantams football coaches Category:Tufts Jumbos coaches Category:Virginia Cavaliers football players
title: Chris Raymond
